markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stonegate](/Feats.aspx?ID=4403) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 45 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Stonewalker](/Feats.aspx?ID=4400)

</column>

---

Earthen barriers no longer impede your progress. You gain [_magic passage_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1591) as a 7th-rank divine innate spell that you can cast once per day. Unlike the spell, however, this ability can be used only to open passages through barriers of earth or stone.
name: Stonegate

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 17" pfs="Standard" > Stonegate Source Player Core pg. 45 2.0 Prerequisites Stonewalker --- Earthen barriers no longer impede your progress. You gain magic passage as a 7th-rank divine innate spell that you can cast once per day. Unlike the spell, however, this ability can be used only to open passages through barriers of earth or stone.
